questions.question: Rotation occurred in the plane polarized light can be measure by

answers.a: Specific rotation is independent of concentration
answers.b: Observed rotation is independent of light path of the polarimeter
answers.c: Observed rotation is independent of concentration
answers.d: Observed rotation is independent of light path of the polarimeter and concentration both
